### Universidad de Alicante

```{r}
library(leaflet)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  setView(lng = -0.5125, lat = 38.3823, zoom = 18) %>%
  addMarkers(lng = -0.5125, lat = 38.3823,
             popup = "Edificio Germán Bernàcer - Universidad de Alicante")
```
